1.title: Nani Kickstarts Bigg Boss 2
1.plot: Natural Star Nani kicks off Season 2 with 16 interesting housemates, all set to begin their journey in the Bigg Boss house for the next 106 days. And guess what, Day Zero has already seen a couple of nominations.

2.title: Elimination is around the corner
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Jr. NTR welcomes the contestants
1.plot: Young heart-throb, Jr. NTR welcomes each of fourteen contestants. He then takes the viewers on a tour inside the much-talked about Bigg Boss House.

2.title: New Captain, New Drama
2.plot: Bigg Boss nominates a house captain. Later, Bigg Boss asks the housemates to nominate two people out of the show, and gives the inmates a task to make a confession about themselves.

3.title: Aadarsh, Dhanraj's Shocking Prank
3.plot: The contestants get their personal belongings and later, Aadarsh and Dhanraj pull off a shocking prank.

4.title: A Secret Task for Sameer
4.plot: Bigg Boss asks Sameer to secretly prevent some contestants' luggage from reaching them. Meanwhile, Hari Teja, Aadarsh and Prince get into an argument.

5.title: Will Mumaith Perform?
5.plot: Sampoornesh is removed from the captaincy and Mumaith is given the responsibility of learning the language. Bigg Boss awaits Mumaith's performance.

6.title: No Smoking!
6.plot: Mumaith Khan and Kalpana compete in a water sport task. Cigarettes are denied to the contestants as the rules of the smoking room were not followed. What will this lead to?

7.title: Elimination or Celebration?
7.plot: Jr NTR is here again, but unfortunately, to eliminate a contestant. However, an elimination round turns into a celebration in the house.

8.title: First Elimination!
8.plot: After a week's stay in the house among all the craziness and fun, who will be the first one to bid adieu? Will it be Mahesh, Hari Teja or Jyothi?

9.title: A Romantic Task!
9.plot: The contestants give their eviction nominations for the week and perform a romantic task assigned by Bigg Boss.

10.title: Sampoornesh Babu Exits The Show
10.plot: Hell breaks loose when an insane Sampoornesh Babu threatens the Big Boss team for his release. Why?

11.title: Who are the Lucky Three?
11.plot: Only three contestants impress Bigg Boss in the assigned task. Later, Shiva Balaji complains about Kalpana's behavior to Bigg Boss.

12.title: Mumaith Khan Leaves!
12.plot: The other contestants are stunned as Bigg Boss asks Mumaith Khan to leave the house. What is the reason behind her eviction?

13.title: Race Gurram Task!
13.plot: Big Boss assigns a dawdling task for Kalpana, Prince and Shiva Balaji. The contestant who manages to rock the horse till the last minute wins.

14.title: Kalpana, The Villain of the Show!
14.plot: Jr. NTR unveils a sword throne and asks everyone to nominate the villain in the house. Kalpana gets nominated as the villain many times. Is she in danger?

15.title: Wild Card Entry!
15.plot: Madhupriya exits the show and shares her experience. Brace yourself as Bigg Boss introduces a wild card entry in the house.

16.title: Safe Zone Nominations
16.plot: The contestants are amused to see Diksha Panth in the house. Bigg Boss asks the contestants to nominate two people to be in the safe zone.

17.title: Mumaith's Never-ending Problems
17.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a role-play task to the contestants. Mumaith Khan causes commotion and pulls a fight with Prince and Shiva Balaji, who end up fighting with each other. Why?

18.title: Prince Kisses Deeksha
18.plot: Hari Teja is low after a quarrel with her team mates. Prince and his team win the luxury budget task. Later, he surprises a shy Deeksha Panth with a kiss.

19.title: Mumaith's Moving Gesture
19.plot: Kalpana and Deeksha fight over a past incident. Bigg Boss assigns a task to the contestants. Later, Mumaith does something which moves everyone to tears.

20.title: Shut Up, Mumaith Khan!
20.plot: Big Boss instructs Prince to plaster Mumaith Khan's mouth. Later, there is commotion in the house because of Mumaith.

21.title: Raksha Bandhan Celebration!
21.plot: The housemates celebrate Raksha Bandhan in the house and later, Jr NTR announces the names of the contestants who are saved from eviction.

22.title: Rana Visits the Show
22.plot: Rana visits the Bigg Boss house and unveils the name of the contestant walking out this week. Who will it be?

23.title: Kalpana Under Pressure?
23.plot: Everyone in the house is assigned a funny task and the house captain, Aadarsh is asked to monitor them. Later, Bigg Boss asks the members to vote out two contestants with appropriate reasons. Will Kalpana get targeted again?

24.title: Shiva Balaji Insults Aadarsh
24.plot: Bigg Boss divides the contestants into two teams and sets up Simhasanas in the house. Later, Shiva Balaji insults Aadarsh till the latter breaks down.

25.title: Who are the Worst Four?
25.plot: Four contestants are punished for their poor performance in the last few tasks. Who are they and what's the punishment? Find out now.

26.title: Hello, Who's This?
26.plot: Mahesh Kathi and Aadarsh's misunderstanding results in an argument in the house. Later, everyone is excited as they get to speak with their family over the phone.

27.title: Who is the New Captain?
27.plot: Hari Teja and Adarsh nominate themselves to get a phone call from their family members. Mumaith Khan, Karthika, Hari Teja and Shiva Balaji contest for the house captain post. Who will win the captaincy?

28.title: Another Inmate Evicted
28.plot: N. T. Rama Rao Jr. unveils the contestant's name whose journey comes to an end this week. Who is it?

29.title: One In, One Out
29.plot: Jr NTR announces the name of the evicted contestant and welcomes a new contestant as a wild card entry.

30.title: Navdeep Begins His Stay
30.plot: The newest member of the house, Navdeep begins his stay and the contestants give their eviction nominations for the week.

31.title: Independence Day Celebrations
31.plot: Bigg Boss assigns the contestants to set up a hotel in the house and asks Navdeep and Diksha to be the guests. Later, the Independence Day celebrations begin.

32.title: The Royal Luxury Budget Task
32.plot: In this luxury budget task, the contestants take good care of Navdeep and Deeksha. Later, Bigg Boss assigns a secret task to Prince. Meanwhile, Shiva Balaji is mighty annoyed. Why?

33.title: Taapsee Pannu In The House
33.plot: Star actress Taapsee Pannu visits the house to promote her latest movie, Anando Brahma and has some fun with the contestants.

34.title: The Going Gets Tough
34.plot: Mumaith fights for captaincy against Navdeep. Bigg Boss gives the contestants a tough task. While performing it some of the contestants hurt themselves and start bleeding.

35.title: Dhanraj's Hilarious Mimicry
35.plot: NTR Jr plays musical chair with the contestants. Dhanraj imitates the contestant's temperament in the house. Later, the host announces two contestants to be safe. Who are those two?

36.title: Twists and Turns for Mumaith
36.plot: NTR Jr asks Mumaith to pack her luggage and leave the house. Later, Bigg Boss plays a fair game and calls her back to the stage. What's the plan of action now?

37.title: Surprising Evictions
37.plot: The contestants vote out Shiva Balaji and Archana, who don't take it too kindly. Later, Bigg Boss assigns a selfie task to the contestants.

38.title: New Task for Mumaith
38.plot: The contestants are stunned when a few robbers steal almost everything from the house. Bigg Boss has a special task for Mumaith Khan.

39.title: Mumaith Is Back!
39.plot: Mumaith surprises everyone with a dramatic entry. She berates Dhanraj for his double game in front of everyone which drives him to tears.

40.title: Archana does a Pole Dance!
40.plot: Hari Teja and Mumaith compete for captaincy. Archana performs a pole dance and amazes everyone. Later, 'Arjun Reddy' Vijay enters the house.

41.title: Lord Ganesha in the House
41.plot: Bigg Boss asks Navdeep to dress up like Lord Ganesha and offer solutions to the contestants' problems. The contestants celebrate Ganesha Chathurthi.

42.title: Double Danger
42.plot: Jr NTR tells the contestants about the elimination twist. Contestants Dhanraj, Kathi Karthika and Archana are in the danger zone. Who gets eliminated?

43.title: Second Eviction of the Week
43.plot: Dhanraj visits the house again. Jr NTR announces the name of the second contestant to get evicted this week. Who will it be?

44.title: Mumaith Turns Rogue
44.plot: Friction builds amid contestants when they have to vote out two contestants. Mumaith's raspy behavior annoys the housemates. Hari Teja denies safeguarding Mumaith from eliminations.

45.title: Culture Fest in the House
45.plot: In this cultural task, the contestants dress up and dance according to the cities in Andhra Pradesh. The housemates complete the task enthusiastically.

46.title: The Hilarious Hari Katha
46.plot: In this cultural task, the contestants dress up and dance according to the cities in Andhra Pradesh. The housemates complete the task enthusiastically.

47.title: Balloon War for Captaincy
47.plot: The housemates get emotional as Bigg Boss reminds them of their childhood. Everyone is asked to fight for team captaincy with balloons. Will Mumaith crack it this time?

48.title: Mumaith's Birthday Celebrations
48.plot: The contestants compete in the CEAT challenge. Actor Sachin visits the house and plays truth or dare. Mumaith Khan celebrates her birthday.

49.title: Suma Visits the House
49.plot: Popular anchor Suma visits and says that she has come to inspect the Bigg Boss house. Later, Jr NTR announces the names of contestants who are free from eviction.

50.title: Who will exit the Show?
50.plot: N. T. Rama Rao Jr. makes the contestants play Dumb Charades in a different way before announcing the name of the exiting housemate. Mumaith, Archana, and Deeksha fret when the name is announced.

51.title: Ghost in Bigg Boss House?
51.plot: Diksha wins the captaincy by a majority of votes. Later, the housemates are asked to vote out two people, but soon some paranormal activities take place in the house.

52.title: Aadarsh, Prince Lock Horns
52.plot: During the luxury budget task, Aadarsh and Prince have a clash. Later, Bigg Boss plays a video clip of the housemates, summing up their journey so far, in the house.

53.title: Let's Get Back to School Life
53.plot: Deeksha and Hari Teja are asked to play the role of teachers while other housemates are asked to play the role of primary school students. A group of kids visit Big Boss house and spend quality time with the contestants.

54.title: Allari Naresh Visits the House
54.plot: Allari Naresh visits the show and auditions the contestants. Big Boss assigns numerous tasks to the housemates in order to win the captaincy. Who will win the captaincy for the second time?

55.title: Time for Appraisals
55.plot: Big Boss asks the contestants to do a self-analysis and stand on the ranking podium accordingly. How will the contestants appraise themselves?

56.title: A Tricky Elimination
56.plot: Jr NTR calls the contestants to the confession room and asks them to choose the person they want to eliminate. What will be the result?

57.title: A Surprising Eviction
57.plot: Jr NTR organizes a Kabaddi game in the house with some interesting new rules. Later, he announces the name of the evicted contestant. Who will it be?

58.title: Deeksha in in trouble
58.plot: All the contestants nominate Diksha to exit the show. Later, Dhanraj, Mahesh Kathi, Karthika and Sampoornesh Babu surprise the contestants.

59.title: A Big Surprise for Aadarsh
59.plot: Bigg Boss plays the freeze and unfreeze game with the contestants. Shiva gets emotional as his wife visits him. Later, a big surprise awaits Aadarsh in the confession room.

60.title: Archana Gets Emotional
60.plot: Bigg Boss continues the freeze and unfreeze game and gives pleasant surprises to Archana, Hari Teja and Navdeep. Later, someone steals their food.

61.title: Deeksha, Archana Lock Horns
61.plot: Shiv Balaji and the housemates enjoy the fight between Diksha and Archana over a petty issue. Celebrity Sunil visits the house and promotes his upcoming movie, Ungarala Rambabu.

62.title: Deeksha's Joy is short-lived
62.plot: Big Boss asks everyone to reveal their favorite spot in the house with reasons. Diksha gets close to Archana until she eavesdrops on her.

63.title: N. T. Rama Rao Jr in the House
63.plot: The housemates are in for a surprise as NTR Jr. himself visits the house along with Niveth Thomas, Raashi Khanna and his brother, Nandamuri Kalyan Ram to promote his most-awaited movie, Jai Lava Kusa.

64.title: Pretty Stiff Competition
64.plot: NTR Jr. takes leave after whipping up some delicious Mutton Biryani for the contestants. Later, he announces the name of the evicted contestant. Will it be Diksha or Archana?

65.title: Last Week in the House
65.plot: As the housemates begin the final week of the season, Bigg Boss asks them to request the audience to vote for them. Will they impress the audience?

66.title: An Unusual Task
66.plot: Every individual pays a visit to the play area as and when Bigg Boss calls out their name. While they are jittery as they enter the play area, as they exit they are all emotional. Why?

67.title: Astrologer in the House
67.plot: Captain Archana becomes the center of attraction as Bigg Boss assigns a task to the male contestants. Later, an astrologer predicts the future of the contestants. How does their future look?

68.title: Time for a Make-over
68.plot: Bigg Boss asks the 5 finalists to take part in the next challenge. Later, they get a make-over from top stylists.

69.title: The Ultimate Face-off
69.plot: The finalists are ecstatic after getting a make-over. Later, they are in for a surprise as one by one the eliminated contestants make a re-entry.

70.title: Last Day in the House
70.plot: All participants take leave after wishing the finalists. The public interacts with the finalists over a video call. Later, each finalist has a surprise in the confession room.

71.title: And the Winner is
71.plot: Tarak begins the finale episode with a bang. Devi Sri Prasad spices up the entertainment quotient, followed by peppy performances by Prince, Diksha, Madhupriya and others. After 70-days in the house, who will walk out as the winner?

imdb.plot outline: Bigg Boss Telugu is a reality show based on the Hindi show Bigg Boss which too was based on the original Dutch Big Brother. A number of contestants (known as "housemates") live in a purpose-built house and are isolated from the rest of the world. Each week, housemates nominate two of their fellow housemates for eviction, and the housemates who receives the most nominations would face a public vote. Eventually, one housemate would leave after being "convicted" from the House. In the final week, there were five housemates remaining, and the public voted for who they wanted to win. Housemates are overseen by a mysterious person known as 'Bigg Boss', whose only presence in the house is through his voice.
imdb.title: Bigg Boss Telugu
plot: _Bigg Boss Telugu_ (qv) is a reality show based on the Hindi show Bigg Boss which too was based on the original Dutch Big Brother. A number of contestants (known as "housemates") live in a purpose-built house and are isolated from the rest of the world. Each week, housemates nominate two of their fellow housemates for eviction, and the housemates who receives the most nominations would face a public vote. Eventually, one housemate would leave after being "convicted" from the House. In the final week, there were five housemates remaining, and the public voted for who they wanted to win. Housemates are overseen by a mysterious person known as 'Bigg Boss', whose only presence in the house is through his voice.::AB THE BOSS
